page.title: 11WALSGRAVE HILL FARM
page.content: Mr.Beatty and his family have been living on the farm since 1921.Mr.Beatty has been a farmer for about 40 years.Most of the buildings in his yards have been up since 1700.He started building up his equipment in the 1940's. They first began taking Mr.Beatty's land about 20 years ago when they began to build a new estate called the Mount Pleasant Estate.They have recently put the M6 through the bottom parts of his land. Mr.Beatty grows wheat and barley at a rate of 2 tons to the acre.He keeps 100 cows which he milks but also to sell for beef at auction. Mr.Beatty has gradually built up the amount of equipment he has and has replaced most of his horses.His oldest tractor is 20 years old!
